history.summary: Participated in ETL-banking system and Healthcare portal projects.
highlights: Developed, implementied and supported common Gitlab pipeline for whole organization
Generatied scripts using bash and python
Writing golang tools
Migrated gitlab registry to artifactory
Set up k8s clusters for runners
Managed AWS infrustructure with terraform
Builded and deployed docker images with kaniko and helm charts
Participated in failover tasks(healthcheck tests, writed changing states function)
Extracted userdata terraform module and changed for the project needs
Integrated datadog alerts(Lambdas and instances monitoring, custom event processing)
Moved project from 2016 win server to the latest
Developed packer pipeline for creating project-owned os-image
Automated notifications for alerts and deploys
Moved manual infra creation to IaC
Developed multiregional infrastructure using terraform

history.summary: Supported, upgraded and developed infrastucture based in AWS and Azure cloud providers for leading in AU-region marketplace
highlights: Participated in production environment migration from local AU datacenter to AWS
Developed and implemented tool which deployed aws lambda on-demand by small config file using pulumi and python
Moved all production databases from legacy MSSQL-cluster to the new one with setting up mirroring and log-shipping for accessing to the prod-data
Implemented monitoring using NewRelic and DataDog
Implemented packer for ec2 images creation
Deployed k8s cluster for dev environment using kops
Builded site-to-site IPsec VPN between AWS accounts and office firewall

history.summary: Supported servers and office infrastructure in satellite car monitoring company
highlights: Developed windows application for bar-code generation using C#
Builded rack servers and moved all servers to server-rack
Was responsible for technical part of opening company branches
Set up new working places in a call center and managed them with Active Directory
Communicated with ISP\VoIP provider in cases of problem and new connection
